quotes.title: If You Will Assume
quotes.author: Neville Goddard
quotes.body: If you will assume your desire and live there as though it were true, no power on earth can stop it from becoming a fact.

quotes.title: Whatever You Affix
quotes.author: Neville Goddard
quotes.body: Whatever you affix to the I AM and believe, you become. The I AM in you is God, there is no other.

quotes.title: Imagining Is
quotes.author: Neville Goddard
quotes.body: Imagining is God in action. It isn't rational. Imagination is not a vague essence, it is a being, a majestic being.

quotes.title: I AM Always
quotes.author: The I AM Discourses Vol 5.
quotes.body: I AM! Always the Miracle-working Presence in everything I desire to have done.~Adorations & Affirmations

quotes.title: I AM the Conquering
quotes.author: The I AM Discourses Vol 3.
quotes.body: I AM the conquering victorious presence in any achievement I desire.

quotes.title: I AM Active, Adventurous, Authentic and..
quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.body: I AM all of these things and more!

quotes.title: Each New Day..
quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.body: Each new day is another chance to change your life.
